title: Ocean bills of lading (B/L) - negotiable/non-negotiable
dataVerified: Shipper, consignee, notify party, carrier, vessel, cargo description, value
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Negotiable B/L is document of title - tampering changes cargo ownership. Domain binding verifies carrier/freight forwarder. Prevents fake B/L fraud (cargo theft). Letter of credit compliance. Multi-page: B/L often multi-page - per-page verification prevents altering cargo details.
